org.netbeans.api.search

Class ReplacePattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.search.ReplacePattern

  • public final class ReplacePattern
extends Object
    Pattern describes the replace conditions ReplacePattern is a wrap class for replace expression.
